dict.acceptation: 谷类植物；谷物；粮食；荞麦食品；

sent.orig: One very important thing is cereal. I often hedge cereal with maple syrup.
sent.trans: 燕麦是很重要的早餐食品。我通常都是燕麦就枫树浆喝。

sent.orig: Try WAKE -- UPS, the new, improved breakfast cereal, the cereal that athletes eat !
sent.trans: 那就请您试试这种新的经过改良的早餐麦片粥，这是运动员食用的麦片粥！

sent.orig: Midsummer Festival has become a wish cereal harvest festival, which attracted broad masses of the people.
sent.trans: 仲夏节已成为一个预祝五谷丰收的节日，吸引着广大的人民群众。

sent.orig: I feel the breakthrough on the technology is company of our cereal song is proudest.
sent.trans: 我觉得技术上的突破是我们谷歌公司最自豪的。

sent.orig: Corn, common name for the cereal grass widely grown for food and livestock fodder.
sent.trans: 玉米，通常被称作禾谷植物作为食物和牲畜的饲料被广泛种植。
